attributes.action: The British people call for Article 50 to be activated before the end of 2016.
attributes.additional_details:
we the undersigned call upon the Prime Minister to defy the political elite and do what the British people voted for by Activating Article 50 setting the wheels in motion for leaving Europe before the end of 2016.
Paving a 2019 departure.
We the British people had already democratically voted winning 52% or 17.4 million votes.
attributes.background:
Never in are British history has it ever been more apparent that we the British people need to make a stand against an out of touch houses of Parliament and those that reside within. 
The British electorate had spoken on Independence Day 23rd June 2016 but again your vote is need once more.
